title: Sussex Health & Care and NHS Sussex
description: Partnership of Sussex organisations (local government, NHS, voluntary, education, etc.) working together for better health and care
sitename: Sussex Health & Care and NHS Sussex
cleaned_text: Launch of improvement plan for Sussex to mark NHS 75th anniversary A long-term improvement plan for health and care across Sussex has been launched to coincide with the 75th anniversary of the NHS. Health and care organisations have set out the immediate and long-term improvements that will be made over the next five years to bring the greatest benefits for local people. Services across the whole country are under increasing pressure due to a number of reasons, including our growing and ageing population, the waiting list backlog that grew during the Covid pandemic, and limited numbers of staff to do everything that needs to be done. The Sussex plan aims to address these issues in the short and to make improvements in the long-term through existing and new initiatives and ways of working.
